Judul: Throughput efficiency and queueing analysis of generalised stop-and-wait ARQ protocols
Abstrak:
This paper deals with the throughput
efficiency and queueing analysis of efficient stopand-
wait ARQ protocols suitable to control errors
in data communication systems. Some novel stopand-
wait ARQ schemes are also proposed. These
stop-and wait ARQ schemes involve simple modifications
of the classical scheme to provide an
higher system reliability. The performance of the
stop-and-wait techniques studied in the paper are
analytically derived to compare their effectiveness
in control errors in data communication systems
with previous proposed efficient stop-and-wait
ARQ schemes, in particular under high error rate
conditions.
Kata Kunci: Errors and error analysis, Communication systems, Queueing theory
